title: Bibliographic Reference
description: A bibliographic reference. This schema borrows from Mendeley's API.

authors.title: Authors
authors.description: An array of authors for this reference.

city.title: City
city.description: The city in which this reference was published.

editors.title: Editors
editors.description: An array of editors for this reference.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: The name of the publisher of this reference.

series.title: Series
series.description: The series in which this publication was published.

translators.title: Translators
translators.description: An array of translations for this reference.

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: The volume number for this publication.

year.title: Year
year.description: The year this item was published.

firstName.title: First Name / Given Name
firstName.description: The person's first name(s) or given name(s).

lastName.title: Last Name / Family Name
lastName.description: The person's last name(s) or family name(s).
